casebody.data:
In re Application of Sabino.

[Cite as In re Application of Sabino (1998), 81 Ohio St.3d 98.]

(No. 97-1927 Submitted November 4, 1997 Decided February 18, 1998.) *99Carl B. Fry and Barry A. Waller, for Columbus Bar Association. Per Curiam.

We adopt the findings, conclusions, and recommendations of the board. Applicant’s request to take the Ohio bar examination is denied, and he is not permitted to reapply for admission to the bar of Ohio.

Judgment accordingly.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
